org.jnosql.diana.api.column

Class ColumnQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jnosql.diana.api.column.ColumnQuery

  • public class ColumnQuery
extends Object
    Class that contains information to do a query to ColumnEntity
    See Also:
    ColumnFamilyManager.find(ColumnQuery), ColumnCondition, Sort

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ColumnQuery addColumn(String column)
      Add column to be either retrieve or deleted, if empty will either returns all elements in a find query or delete all elements in a column family entity.
      ColumnQuery addSort(Sort sort)
      Add the order how the result will returned
      ColumnQuery and(ColumnCondition condition)
      Appends a new condition in the query using ColumnCondition.and(ColumnCondition)
